hints.content: Let's use the place value blocks on the chart to help us solve.

We can put our two numbers together on the place value chart.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/6ed73f8a2fb9d96378a9c133308bc3228b526d9e)

There are $7\text{ hundreds}, 13\text{ tens}$ and $2\text{ ones}$.

Now we can take our $13\text{ tens}$ and make $1\text{ hundred}$ and $3\text{ tens}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/d79cd17f37ad61ff7dfa90119843ed4da0df837b)

In all, there are $8\text{ hundreds}, 3\text{ tens}$ and $2\text{ ones}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/1bffafaeabb6b628c0599ced217608495345a422)

$800 + 30+ 2= 832$
